titleStmt.title: An examination of Dr. Woodward's account of the deluge, &c. with a comparison between Steno's philosophy and the doctor's, in the case of marine bodies dug out of the earth / by J.A. ... ; with a letter to the author concerning an abstract of Agostino Scilla's book on the same subject, printed in the philosophical transactions by W.W. ...
titleStmt.author: Arbuthnot, John, 1667-1735.
Wotton, William, 1666-1727.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Arbuthnot. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
